text: Cherson (or Kherson) may refer to the following places and jurisdictions : * Kherson, a city in southern Ukraine, the administrative center of the Kherson Oblast (province) * Chersonesus Taurica, an ancient Greek colony founded approximately 2,500 years ago in the southwestern part of Crimea * Cherson (theme), a Byzantine military province located in the southern Crimea, centred at Chersonesus Taurica * the former Roman Catholic Diocese of Cherson (renamed Tiraspol), in and around post-Soviet Moldavia * 2701 Cherson, a main-belt asteroid discovered on 1 September 1978 by Nikolai Chernykh
title: Cherson
